body:
Ok, thanks for your work guys but there are some issues in this pull request. I will list them and then discuss a possible solution:

1) I don't like the @@to_path variable cache. The simplest solution is to move the logic to the class and simply cache using @_to_path. Depending on model_name isn't also a good idea as @Peeja pointed out.

2) This change will also affect performance on the partial renderer.

So I want to point a solution that won't require deprecation and provide the same feature. Let's simply change PartialRenderer to check if the object respond to the method "to_partial_path", if so, it will simply call this method, if not, it will use the logic we have today, including the HASH cache we have in the partial renderer.

What do you guys think?
